parchment.name: Parchment
parchment.desc: Scraps from the exterior of a skyrmex wasp. A slight forcefield impedes motion around them.

wasp_gland.name: Wasp Gland
wasp_gland.desc: An organ used by the skyrmex wasps to process gases into a form they can digest.

wasp_eggs.name: Wasp Eggs
wasp_eggs.desc: The tiny wasps inside those eggs could become a menace if hatched.

paper_armor.name: Paper Armor
paper_armor.desc: Extremely light armor that generates a weak energy field.

linen_armor.name: Linen Armor
linen_armor.desc: Very light armor with an energy shield.

silk_armor.name: Silk Armor
silk_armor.desc: Medium weight armor combined with a decent shield.

queen_bio_refinery.name: Queen Bio-Refinery
queen_bio_refinery.desc: Efficiently processes gas into various chemicals needed for the wasp lifecycle.
